original_text: “For ask now of the days that are past, which were before you, since the day that God created man on the earth, and ask from one end of heaven to the other, whether such a great thing as this has ever happened or was ever heard of.
korean_text: 네가 있기 전 하나님이 사람을 세상에 창조하신 날부터 지금까지 지나간 날을 상고하여 보라 하늘 이 끝에서 저 끝까지 이런 큰 일이 있었느냐 이런 일을 들은 적이 있었느냐

sentences.original_text: For ask now of the days that are past
since the day that God created man on the earth
and ask from one end of heaven to the other
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 하늘 한 끝에서 다른 끝까지 물어보라

sentences.original_text: whether such a great thing as this has ever happened
sentences.korean_translation: 이처럼 큰 일이 일어난 적이 있는지
